description:
Crystal Berry Crusher is a brand new and crazy Match-3 game! Another fastest,most explosive and lighting Crystal Berry Crusher - matching game.Swap and slide lovely fruit on the board, arrange Crystal into matching groups of three or more to collect, Start your sweet journey in this puzzle adventure!

Crystal Berry Crusher is a amazing casual game,with lovely fruit,beautiful UI,exciting animation,which bring you kindly operation feelings,it has more than 50 fantastic missions,easy to get start,designed for all ages of players,welcome to us and find the best gaming experience.

Game Features:
- Classy graphics, super tasty fruits and Gorgeous fruit blast effect
- Eliminate multi-fruit in a single crush can bring a powerful tool, which can help to pass the level!
- One of the best match 3 games
- Completely free and play
- Stunning arcade effects
- Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master.

Download Color Crystal Berry Crusher and Spree yourself in the Crystal Berry Crush world!
How to play:
1. Swap the Crystal to match 3 in a line to remove them
2. Scoring the target points to level up
3. Match as fast as you can level up in time mode
